products.name: Majestic Cathedral Geode - Grand #01
products.description: An extraordinary cathedral geode featuring deep purple amethyst crystals with exceptional clarity and natural cave-like formation. This museum-quality specimen showcases the finest characteristics of Uruguayan amethyst, making it an ideal centerpiece for luxury interiors or exhibition spaces.
characteristics: Museum-quality cathedral formation with natural cave structure
Deep purple crystal points with exceptional transparency
Multiple viewing angles reveal stunning interior crystal clusters
Premium specimen suitable for statement display

products.name: Royal Purple Statement Geode - Grand #02
products.description: A stunning geode with vibrant royal purple amethyst crystals that catch and reflect light beautifully. The impressive size and color saturation make this piece perfect for creating a focal point in sophisticated spaces.
characteristics: Ideal for luxury residential or commercial display

products.name: Twilight Cathedral Formation - Grand #03
products.description: A magnificent cathedral-style geode with rich purple tones reminiscent of twilight skies. The natural architectural formation creates dramatic interior displays with multiple crystal points reaching upward.

products.name: Deep Violet Exhibition Geode - Grand #04
products.description: An exceptional museum-grade geode featuring deep violet amethyst crystals of remarkable clarity. The impressive size and exhibition-quality formation make this piece worthy of the finest collections and gallery displays.
characteristics: Deep violet crystals with superior clarity

products.name: Amethyst Dream Geode - Grand #05
products.description: A beautiful geode with dreamy purple amethyst crystals that create an enchanting display. Perfect for those seeking a substantial premium piece with excellent color and formation.

products.name: Purple Majesty Cluster - Grand #06
products.description: A majestic crystal cluster displaying rich purple hues and excellent formation. The substantial size and premium quality make this piece ideal for sophisticated interior design.

products.name: Lavender Elegance Geode - Grand #07
products.description: An elegant geode featuring soft lavender to deeper purple gradients. The refined coloration and quality formation exemplify the sophisticated beauty of Uruguayan amethyst.
characteristics: Elegant lavender to purple color gradient

products.name: Violet Crown Formation - Grand #08
products.description: A signature piece featuring violet amethyst crystals arranged in a crown-like formation. This distinctive specimen combines size, color, and unique structure for an impressive display.

products.name: The Grand Amethyst Cathedral - Grand #09
products.description: The crown jewel of our Grand Collection - an extraordinary cathedral geode of exceptional size and quality. With 28 detailed angles captured in photography, this museum-grade specimen showcases the absolute finest Uruguayan amethyst available. Perfect for luxury hotels, galleries, or prestigious private collections.
characteristics: Monumental size - nearly one meter in height
Deep purple crystals with outstanding clarity
Suitable for institutional or high-end residential display
The premier piece of the Grand Collection
